title: Melanoplus saltator
data: Melanoplus saltator, known generally as the Willamette short-wing grasshopper or leaping spur-throat grasshopper, is a species of spur-throated grasshopper in the family Acrididae.[1][2][3][4] It is found in North America.[1][5] This article about a member of the grasshopper genus Melanoplus is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
